abstract: A New memo argues that Rick Perry's tax plan "radically restructures the tax system and shifts a greater tax burden onto the middle class."
snippet: A New memo argues that Rick Perry's tax plan "radically restructures the tax system and shifts a greater tax burden onto the middle class."
lead_paragraph: Rick Perry's decision to embrace a flat tax as a central part of his economic plan, as several other Republican candidates have, is providing an opportunity for President Obama's campaign.

headline.main: Obama Attacks Perry on Flat Tax
